Name: Teqroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Lighter and slightly sweeter than a classic gin-based Negroni with Italian bitter liqueur. However, this Italian and Mexican trio make for pleasing cross-continental bedfellows.
History: Unknown, but as the same suggests this is simply a tequila-based Negroni.
Nutrition: One serving of Teqroni contains 182 calories
